markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs=""
>
[Emancipator's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3434) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 78</row>

**Archetypes** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6), [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12) (Level 20)

**Prerequisites**
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=701) or [Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=742)

</column>

---

Your mask grants you the abilities of Whistling Kite, the Vigilant Seer, who emancipated thousands. When you are attempting a check to free someone else from an effect that [immobilizes](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), [paralyzes](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), or [controls](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6) them, roll twice and take the higher result; this is a [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76) effect. The GM might decide that this fortune effect applies when attempting checks to remove other conditions or effects to free another. Immediately after you Cast a non-cantrip Spell that targets only one creature, you can choose to permit the target to make an attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79).

<title level="2">Masks of the Magic Warriors</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 78</row>

In becoming Jatembe's new Magic Warriors, the heroes have unlocked secrets of magical potential that none have reached since the earliest Ten Magic Warriors walked the plazas of the Magaambya.

 On reaching 20th level, the heroes should have the option of taking one of these archetype feats, based on the type of animal they chose for their mask when they first created it in _Pathfinder Adventure Path #169: Kindled Magic_. These options are each themed to one of Jatembe's magic warriors, but if a hero's mask doesn't fit with a specific animal from this list or the player feels their animal embodies a different effect from the list, feel free to reflavor the feat names to fit the hero's spirit face. For instance, the Cunning Trickster mask could easily be a rodent or a fox, not just a spider.

**Related Feats**: [Cunning Trickster Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3433), [Grand Medic's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3435), [Protective Spirit Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3436), [Sky Master Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3437), [Stalking Feline Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3438), [Storyteller's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3439), [Thick Hide Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3440), [Tireless Guide's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3441), [Vigilant Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3442)
name: Emancipator's Mask
